jsonComments.installTips: Please install the JsonComments plugin to enable commenting functionality for JSON files, see: https://github.com/zhangfisher/json_comments_extension
jsonComments.saveFile.title: Save comments to file:
jsonComments.saveFile.description: Save all comments to this JSON file:
jsonComments.entryKey.title: Comment entry key
jsonComments.entryKey.description: Name of the key in the JSON file where comments are saved
jsonComments.enable.title: Show comments
jsonComments.command.addComments.title: Add comments
jsonComments.command.editComments.title: Edit comments
jsonComments.command.clearComments.title: Clear comments
